title: Can anyone speak to the claims in this COVID-19 article? - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: The person writing this article is trying to mislead you into thinking you are safe. You are not safe. There is no immunity to this virus. The numbers you are not being told are the real numbers in the USA right now: Closed cases (cases which had an outcome): 209,080 Recovered cases: 147.411 (71%) Deaths: 61,669 (29%) Total cases: 1,064.572 Active cases: 855,492 How many will die?????????? How many will live????? from: United States Coronavirus: 1,064,572 Cases and 61,669 Deaths

I think a deadly flu season would kill about 1%. COVID-19 is killing about 3%. That’s 200% additional deaths. Do most people live though it — sure. Turns out that our leaders, mostly, are part of the old guard — the ones most affected. It would be nice to have a vaccine — even if it only lowered the kill rate to 1%.

Although the Washington Times has a very strong right editorial bias, they report straight news with a much lower bias. They project a Right-Center bias overall, considered questionable and factually mixed due to poor sourcing, holding editorial positions that are contrary to scientific consensus, and numerous failed fact checks. The linked Opinion piece is a strong example of this. OPINION.
